p:
Daegu (
R
0
S
= 3.7) has a much higher reproduction number than other regions due to group infections among the Shincheonji religious group, while Gyeongbuk (
R
0
S
= 2.6) has the next highest reproduction number due to group infections in nursing hospitals where senior citizens are hospitalized. The number of infected people in Gyeongbuk increased rapidly from the date of infection, similar to Daegu, but the reproduction number was smaller than that of Daegu.
